A Faith That Never Despairs

See all men as they can be in Christ and not just as they are as sinners.

Mary Magdalene – Saul of Tarsus – Simon Peter

I Cor. 2:2-5; II Cor. 5:17

There is HOPE for the vilest!

Gen. 18:14 “Is there anything too hard for the Lord?”

Luke 6:35 Despair of no man. (give up for dead. I Sam. 27:1)

Matt. 1:5 The Messiah came through the line of Rahab the harlot and Ruth the Moabite. Jesus was born through all kinds of people that He might save all kinds.

@sw

VI. Imani isiyo na kukata Tamaa

Waone wanadamu wote jinsi wanavyoweza kuwa katika Kristo na sio kama wanavyoonekana wadhambi.

Maria Magdalena – Saulo wa Tarsisi – Simoni Petro

I Kor. 2:2-5; II Kor. 5:17

Kuna MATUMAINI kwa wale wenye dhambi nyingi zaidi!

Mwa. 18:14 “Kuna neno gani lililo gumu la kumshinda Bwana?”

Luk 6:35 Yeye ni mwema kwa wasiomshukuru. (Kopesheni wanaokufa. I Sam. 27:1)

Mt.. 1:5 Masiha alizaliwa katika uzao wa Rahabu yule kahaba na Ruth wa Moabu. Yesu alizaliwa katika hali hiyo ili aweze kuwaokoa watu wa aina zote.
